# experience-ui Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-26

## Active Technologies

- TypeScript 5.x (strict mode) + React 19, Electron 34 (desktop shell), Zustand (state management), Allotment (split panes), Monaco Editor (spec viewing), swagger-parser + graphql-js (spec parsing/validation), esbuild (in-browser bundling of generated UI code) (001-api-ui-generator)

## Project Structure

```text
src/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript 5.x (strict mode): Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes

- 001-api-ui-generator: Added TypeScript 5.x (strict mode) + React 19, Electron 34 (desktop shell), Zustand (state management), Allotment (split panes), Monaco Editor (spec viewing), swagger-parser + graphql-js (spec parsing/validation), esbuild (in-browser bundling of generated UI code)
